Bishop Botanicals Facial Clay Mask

Brand: Bishop Botanicals

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Kaolin (and) Illite (Yellow Clay), Buttermilk Powder, Cucurbita Pepo (Pumpkin Powder), Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut Extract), Camellia sinensis (Green Tea Extract), Rosa canina (Rosehip Extract).
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
